meanings: mechanical gambling game superficially resembling pinball

lessons.japanese: 彼がパチンコするなんて絶対にないよ。
lessons.english: He wouldn't be caught dead playing pachinko.

lessons.japanese: 私たちは、パチンコをして時を過ごした。
lessons.english: We passed the time playing pachinko.

lessons.japanese: 次郎はパチンコでガッポリもうけて上機嫌だった。
lessons.english: Jiro was all smiles after he made a bundle at the pachinko parlor.

lessons.japanese: 次郎はパチンコでガッポリもうけて上機嫌だった。
lessons.english: Jiro was all smiles after he made a bundle at the pachinko parlor.

lessons.japanese: 私たちは、パチンコをして時を過ごした。
lessons.english: We passed the time playing pachinko.

lessons.japanese: 彼がパチンコするなんて絶対にないよ。
lessons.english: He wouldn't be caught dead playing pachinko.

lessons.japanese: パチンコをし過ぎるから、妻は彼に怒っている。
lessons.english: He plays too much pachinko, so his wife is mad at him.

lessons.japanese: パチンコをし過ぎるから、妻は彼に怒っている。
lessons.english: He plays too much pachinko, so his wife is mad at him.
